amendment.description: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 132 in the Congressional Record of August 2, 1995 to prohibit the payment of salary of any government official who accepts for personal benefit tax exempt funds from any tax-exempt organization.

action.text: Mr. Porter raised a point of order against the Menendez amendment (A026). Mr. Porter stated that the provisions of the amendment proposed changes to existing law and constituted legislation on an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
